page.title: 15SHOPPING SURVEY
page.content: One day we went on a shopping survey in Wilson Road and we were asking lots of questions, we asked-1 Where do you usually go shopping? Lots of people said they go shopping in Cardiff. 2 Do you always do the shopping in your family? Most people said yes. 3 Do you work in this area? Most people said no. 4 Do you go shopping often? Lots of people said yes. 5 Do you prefer to shop here or in Cardiff? Most said Cardiff. 6 Do you like shopping in this area? Lots said no. 7 Give a reason for your answer? Lots of people said it was too expensive. Which days of the week do you do your shopping? Most people said Monday or Friday. 9 How many people are there in your family? The biggest family was eight. 10 Do you have any animals? Most people said yes. cont.
